content: an oober chunky norcal version of the famous pussy hat when using the hikoo zumie you can get 2 hats out of one skein either make two child smalls a child small & adult small or just one adult large **sizes** child small adult small adult large 19 21 23 inches **finished measurements** 9 5 x 14 10 5 x 16 11 5 x 18 **yardage** 45 60 80 yards
